about.title: Who are we?
about.body: The Creative Labs community is managed by a small team of developers, designers, and project managers.

about.title: What do we do?
about.body: Creative Labs gives students the platform that allows them to make their ideas come to life. We were founded on the dream to just make cool things.

projects.title: Spring 2020
projects.body: Completed projects during our very first virtual quarter.
